channel.title: CVE Feed for OmniAuth -- OmnitAuth-SAML
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OmniAuth -- OmnitAuth-SAML

item.title: CVE-2017-11430|2024-08-05T18:12:39.543Z -- omniauth -- omnitauth-saml
item.description: OmniAuth OmnitAuth-SAML 1.9.0 and earlier may incorrectly utilize the results of XML DOM traversal and canonicalization APIs in such a way that an attacker may be able to manipulate the SAML data without invalidating the cryptographic signature, allowing the attack to potentially bypass authentication to SAML service providers.
